Proposed Change: Change definition from "Machine-readable identification string for the organisation issuing the report." to "Machine-readable identification string for the organisation being reported on."
Rationale:
To correct an error in the Standard. 

The current definition duplicates the `iati-organisation/reporting-org/@ref <https://iatistandard.org/en/iati-standard/203/organisation-standard/iati-organisations/iati-organisation/reporting-org/>`_ definition.

Proposed Change: Update the definition to declare that they are case insensitive.
Rationale: To simplify analysis of IATI data, and avoid mis-matches due to case.
